txt.en: 'Ah, that was just the thing. Nothing like a good fight to make you feel alive!\n\n'I have some more names for you: Matum, Urbh치r, and Golb. Choose one of them to punish and remind the other two why it is wisest not to cross the boss. You'll find any of them within the Ring.'
'That was well done! Morflak will be pleased, and when Morflak is pleased, it is good for all of us.'
'You're one of Morflak's new pets, are you? Well, the way I see it, you'll end up the same way as all the others. And maybe I'll be the one to help you on your way!'
'Do you think you can defeat me? You have no chance! Morflak should have come himself and done his own dirty work!'

The Uruk-hai named Gluthrak, Hoital, and Farmak can be found somewhere within the Ring of Isengard.\n\nMorflak's lackey wants you to fight one of the Uruk-hai named by his boss in order to quell any challenges to his power.
Morflak's lackey has some more names for you.
The Uruk-hai named Matum, Urbh치r, and Golb can be found somewhere within the Ring of Isengard.
Morflak's lackey is waiting to speak with you.
Find and challenge Gluthrak, Hoital, or Farmak
Find and challenge Matum, Urbh치r, or Golb
'I'll kill you, and then I'll kill Morflak!'
'You won't speak to me like that again!'
Morflak's lackey has given you the names of some Uruk-hai his boss does not trust and that he wants you to punish.

'You heard the boss. As long as we stay in line, he treats us well and everybody wins. But if you cross him, that's another story.

'Sometimes, an Uruk-hai gets it into his head to try and displace Morflak. He thinks maybe if he's in charge, he'll get noticed by the Old Man and be given some treat. He sees what Morflak has, and he wants it. It's in his best interest not to cross the boss, but he forgets it.

'The boss gave me the names of some of the boys who might be planning on acting up. The names are Gluthrak, Hoital, and Farmak. Let's pay one of them a visit. That might put the fear of Morflak back in the others, where it should be. I could use a fight.'
